attributes.action: Allow students to go to the toilet in schools
attributes.additional_details: I think the government should do this because it’s a basic human right and students shouldn’t be risking their health because a teacher said they can’t go to the toilet
attributes.background: Make it law for students to use the toilets at least once a day

rejection.details:
Decisions on policies regarding when students can leave the classroom are a matter for individual schools and teachers, not the UK Government or House of Commons.

If you are unhappy with how a school or teacher deals with requests to use the toilet, you should raise this with the school or relevant local authority.
